rules_text:
If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore one of those results.
Whenever At Odds Gate enters the battlefield or you roll one or more die, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: [i]To challenge a god, you need to take your own chance.[/i]
notes:
Whenever you roll a die or CARDNAME> enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

If an ability would trigger you to roll a die, that ability triggers an additional time.

Whenever you roll a die, you may put target card from your graveyard into your library sixth from the top.

When At Odds Gate enters the battlefield and whenever you roll a 6, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
